## IDebugSharedObjectLifeCycleChecker interface

Wrapper of [FinalizationRegistry](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/FinalizationRegistry) for shared objects, useful for checking if the shared object was properly disposed. Available in debug contexts only.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IDebugSharedObjectLifeCycleChecker 
```
